params._dataStream: The address of the data stream contract

params._isHealthy: The address of the IsHealthy contract
params._lendingPoolDeployer: The address of the lending pool deployer contract

createLendingPool(address,address,uint25.details: This function deploys a new lending pool using the lending pool deployer and adds it to the pools registry

params.borrowToken: The address of the borrow token
params.collateralToken: The address of the collateral token
params.ltv: The Loan-to-Value ratio for the pool (in basis points)

returns._0: The address of the newly created lending pool

addTokenDataStream(address,address).notice: Adds a token data stream for price feeds and other data

basicTokenSender(uint256).notice: Mapping from chain ID to basic token sender address

createLendingPool(address,address,uint25.notice: Creates a new lending pool with the specified parameters

helper().notice: The address of the bridge router contract

isHealthy().notice: The address of the IsHealthy contract for health checks

lendingPoolDeployer().notice: The address of the lending pool deployer contract

owner().notice: The owner of the factory contract

protocol().notice: The address of the protocol contract

tokenDataStream(address).notice: Mapping from token address to its data stream address
